00010 int size(Cell* const c) throw (runtime_error)
00011 {
00012   if (!listp(c)) {
00013     throw runtime_error("passing non-cons cell to size()");
00014   }
00015   Cell* temp_c = c;
00016   int counter = 0;
00017   
00018   // loop through the list starting from c
00019   while (!nullp(temp_c)) {
00020     ++counter;
00021     temp_c = cdr(temp_c);
00022   }
00023   
00024   return counter;
00025 }
00026 
00032 string to_str(int i) throw (runtime_error)
00033 {
00034   ostringstream oss;
00035   oss << i;
00036   return oss.str();
00037 }
00044 void check_argn(int min, int max, int actual) throw (runtime_error)
00045 {
00046   if (actual < min || actual > max) {
00047     if (min == max) {
00048       throw runtime_error("bad argument count - expected " + to_str(min) + " but received " + to_str(actual));
00049     } else {
00050       throw runtime_error("bad argument count - expected " + to_str(min) + " to " + to_str(max) + " but received " + to_str(actual));
00051     }
00052   }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void check_argn(int min, int actual) throw (runtime_error)
00056 {
00057   if (actual < min) {
00058     throw runtime_error("bad argument count - expected at least" + to_str(min) + " but received " + to_str(actual));
00059   }
00060 }
